invite-friends.title: Invite your friends
invite-friends.description: Invite all your friends and family by email. They will be able to enter their wishlists in private.

assign.title: Randomly assign gifts
assign.description: With just one click Givto assigns a Secret Santa to everyone. The identity of the Secret Santas remains secret.

not-found.title: Givto didn't find this page üòß
not-found.description: Either this page doesn't exist, or you are not logged in.

group-page.no-wishlist: {name} has not entered a wishlist yet
group-page.no-wishlist-hint: Gently nudge him or her to add some items to their wishlist üòâ
group-page.group-name-hint: Give your Secret Santa a name ‚ú®

login.hint: Sign in to Givto using your email address
login.email-sent: We sent an email to you at
login.email-sent-hint: The email contains a magic link that will sign you in to Givto.
login.success: Successfully logged in, you can safely close this tab!

confirm-email-modal.email-sent: Almost there! We sent an email to you at
confirm-email-modal.email-sent-hint: The email contrains a secret code so you can confirm your email.
confirm-email-modal.error: Incorrect sign in code, please try again

create-group.name: Name

exclusions.title: Exclusions
exclusions.description: Exclude combinations from the Secret Santa. You can make maximum {max, plural, =1 {1 exclusion} other {# exclusions} } for a Secret Santa with {count} people.
exclusions.unavailable: Exclude combinations from the Secret Santa. Exlusions are only available for Secret Santa's with 4 or more participants.

validation.creator: Please input your name and email
validation.invitee: Please provide a name and email for at least 2 friends

create-group.more_invitees_hint: Tip! More fields will appear as you add more friends

wishlist.title: Title
wishlist.description-placeholder: Describe your gift! include hints, links etc.
